original_title: Brooklyn: Plaza Street - St. Johns Place
text:
30-50 Plaza Street, east side, as seen across clearing from St. John's Place, No. 50 is in the foreground, and at the N.E. corner of Butler Place.

August 29, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

Prospect Park Entrance: The arch at the Grand Army Plaza, erected in honor of the Civil War dead.  Views 2 and 3 show also The Towers, an apartment house at Flatbush Avenue and St. Johns Place.

about 1900

P. L. Sperr
January 1, 1937
